title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added a new entry for "GitHub Secret Scanning Base64 Encoded" token type in `public-docs.yml`:
Enabled for public repos, private repos with GHAS, and push protection

summary:
- Added a new entry for "GitHub Secret Scanning Base64 Encoded" token type in `public-docs.yml`:
- Supports all versions (`fpt`, `ghec`)
- Enabled for public repos, private repos with GHAS, and push protection
- Explicitly marks `base64Supported: true`
- Updated SHA hashes in `config.json` to reflect documentation changes
generated_title: Add support for base64-encoded tokens in secret scanning
commits: **fce7361**: Merge pull request #57614 from github/repo-sync (by docs-bot)

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added a new entry for "GitHub Secret Scanning Base64 Encoded" token type in `public-docs.yml`:
  - Supports all versions (`fpt`, `ghec`)
  - Enabled for public repos, private repos with GHAS, and push protection
  - Explicitly marks `base64Supported: true`
- Updated SHA hashes in `config.json` to reflect documentation changes

### Title
Add support for base64-encoded tokens in secret scanning
